entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
